physical_examinations.relevant_findings: 71-year-old male patient, exertional dyspnea noted. CT scan demonstrated scattered bilateral micronodules (<5 mm), stable over several years. Follow-up PET/CT showed mild reduction in 68Ga-PSMA-ligand uptake within the stable node.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial findings of a solitary 7-mm right perihilar noncalcified node with mild to moderate 68Ga-PSMA-ligand avidity, subsequently showed mild reduction in uptake three months later.
